mapper.insert: insert into recycle_order ( order_no, uid, city, address, phone, start_time, end_time, order_img, status, remark, is_delete, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by) values ( #{orderNo}, #{uid}, #{city}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{orderImg}, 1, #{remark}, 0, now(), #{createBy}, now(), #{updateBy})
mapper.select: select * from recycle_order where is_delete = 0 and uid = #{uid}
